Package org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.re

Class REQuestion

java.lang.Object
org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.Logic
org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.re.RegularExpression
org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.re.REUnion
org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.re.REQuestion
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class REQuestion
extends REUnion
This class represents the zero or one occurrence of a regular expression, denoted by a? which is equivalent to (e|a).
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai
See Also:
Serialized Form
